meanings.definition: Positioned or suspended below something else.
meanings.sent1: The underhung shelf was securely attached to the bottom of the table.
meanings.sent2: The chandelier was underhung from the ceiling, casting a soft glow in the room.
meanings.sent3: The underhung hammock made it look like the cat was floating in mid-air.
meanings.sent4: The underhung roots of the tree reached deep into the ground for stability.
meanings.sent5: The underhung sign swung gently in the breeze, catching the attention of passersby.

meanings.definition: Having a lower jaw that protrudes beyond the upper jaw.
meanings.sent1: The bulldog's underhung jaw gave it a unique appearance.
meanings.sent2: The underhung bite of the crocodile allowed it to grip its prey firmly.
meanings.sent3: The underhung jaw of the cartoon character made it comically endearing.
meanings.sent4: The underhung jaw of the machine clamped down with incredible force.
meanings.sent5: The underhung jaw of the vice grip held the metal piece securely in place.
